law.catch_line: Special panal to decide discretionary matters.

text.section:
Sec. 23-65. Special panal to decide discretionary matters.
All discretionary matters arising under the provisions of this article shall be approved by a panel of five (5) members, consisting of the worker's compensation claims supervisor and a safety officer who are obliged to investigate all job-connected deaths, and one (1) representative of the County Manager's Office, the Personnel Department, and the Department of the descendent.
